summary.span: A helper class that provides information about the browser environment in which a XAML browser application (XBAP) application is hosted.

summary.span: Gets a script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame.

span.span: Gets a script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame.

value.span: 如果提供对 HTML 窗口对象、 自定义脚本函数和全局变量的 HTML 页中，访问脚本对象 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 位于帧的值。否则为。

span.span: A script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过返回对象，你可以访问属性、 方法和事件的 HTML 窗口对象、 一个脚本函数直接调用，或访问全局变量。With the returned object, you can access the properties, methods, and events of the HTML window object, call a script function directly, or access a global variable. 若要访问这些项的语法使用熟悉的点表示法。The syntax to access these items uses the familiar dot notation. 窗口对象有关的详细信息，请参阅[窗口对象](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274)动态 HTML (DHTML) 文档中。For more information about the window object, see [window object](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274) in the Dynamic HTML (DHTML) documentation. 属性返回`null`如果从跨域位置导航到框架。The property returns `null` if the frame is navigated to from a cross-domain location. 此功能可关闭 Internet explorer 通过设置**ScriptInteropDisallow**注册表值。This feature can be turned off for Internet Explorer by setting the **ScriptInteropDisallow** registry value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索对象，并关闭浏览器窗口。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the object and close the browser window. [!code-xaml[XbapBrowserInterop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/cs/page1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[XbapBrowserInterop#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/cs/page1.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[XbapBrowserInterop#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/vb/page1.xaml.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsBrowserHosted As Boolean
public: static property bool IsBrowserHosted { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application is browser hosted.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application is browser hosted.

value.span: 如果应用程序由浏览器承载;否则为。

span.span: if the application is browser hosted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以是主机不可知，并且，因此，可以将加载到多种不同类型的主机，包括、 ，或浏览器。A can be host agnostic and, consequently, can be loaded into several different types of hosts, including a , a , or a browser. 这可能会在有库程序集包含一个或多个页面，从中并且所引用的多个独立和可浏览 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) 托管应用程序。This can happen when you have a library assembly that contains one or more pages, and which is referenced by multiple standalone and browsable ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) host applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以确定是否托管浏览器中。The following example demonstrates how to use to determine if a is hosted in a browser. [!code-csharp[HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets#IsBrowserHostedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#isbrowserhostedcode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets#IsBrowserHostedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#isbrowserhostedcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性只包含为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]应用程序。The property contains only a for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] applications. 有关的示例属性，请参阅。For an example of the property, see .
